articles.title: IPL 2021: 'He is better than genius' - Sanjay Manjrekar's ultimate praise for RCB batsman AB de Villiers - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sanjay Manjrekar took to Twitter and wrote if there is any adjective 'better than genius’ then that should be reserved for AB de Villiers after the South Africa great led RCB to a thrilling two-wicket win against MI in IPL 2021 match No.1 in Chennai.
articles.content: Former India batsman and now a renowned commentator, Sanjay Manjrekar reserved praise of the highest order for Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) batsman AB de Villiers after he rolled back the clock … [+2585 chars]
